history.content:
I am in this same boat. I looked in the past summers on classes.berkeley.edu and 16b has been offered in lots of previous summers. I believe the summer schedule will be released in December(? or possibly November), so we will know then. If it's not offered then we'll cross that bridge when we get to it! :)

edit: they also said they are trying to offer it. Take a look here: @15836_f1

I am in this same boat. I looked in the past summers on classes.berkeley.edu and 16b has been offered in lots of previous summers. I believe the summer schedule will be released in December(? or possibly November), so we will know then. If it's not offered then we'll cross that bridge when we get to it! :)

I apologize if this has been asked before but I was recommended by CS61B to take 16B as a first or second-year. I have not taken Math 54 or 16a yet so that will be the plan for next semester, however from what I understand I cannot take 16b without or on top of those classes at the same time. Will 16b be offered in the summer or am I doomed to seek good luck as a junior attempting to take 16b?
history.subject: Haven't taken 16a as a sophomore
